p: The results of phenol and flavonoid contents in our study were significantly more than those which were reported by Abdel-Hameed et al. These values in water byproducts were 48.27 ± 1.27 and 16.68 ± 0.73 mg gallic acid equivalent/g extract for phenol and flavonoid, respectively. ESI (−ve): MS analysis of this byproduct supports the presence of phenolic compounds belonging to hydrolysable tannins and flavonoids [ 17].
